iati-activity.title: Reconstruction and Development for the Public Expenditure Tracking Survey for Education in Angola (World Bank)
iati-activity.description: World Bank to carry out public expenditure tracking survey in Education Sector in Angola, to improve government and partner understanding of causes of poor budget execution, blockages and leakages. This will help them design improvements in financial managment for better education outcomes
